intro: Kleinia subrahmanianii, commonly known as the Red Flower Daisies, is a flowering plant native to the arid regions of southern Africa. It belongs to the Asteraceae family and is characterized by its vibrant red or orange flowers that bloom in dense clusters. The plant has succulent leaves that are adapted to store water, enabling it to thrive in dry environments. It is often found growing in rocky soils and is well-suited for xeriscaping due to its low water requirements. Its striking appearance makes it a popular choice for ornamental gardening in warm climates.
